patthana15.12:1.1_0: Nahetuṁ parittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)
patthana15.12:2.1_0: Hetuṁ mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.12:3.1_0: Hetuṁ appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
